articles.author: Joe Pappalardo
articles.title: A supersonic jet chased a solar eclipse across Africa—for science - National Geographic
articles.description: In 1973 scientists aboard a Concorde jet participated in an epic, continent-wide eclipse chase. A similar flight next year seeks to unravel enduring mysteries of the sun.
articles.content: In 1973 scientists aboard a Concorde jet participated in an epic, continent-wide eclipse chase. A similar flight next year seeks to unravel enduring mysteries of the sun.
